channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple AirPods Are Now FDA-Approved Hearing Aids — Here’s What That Means
item.description: Apple’s earbuds and smartwatches are taking on medical-grade features, from hearing support to sleep apnea detection.

item.title: In Photos: 12-Mile-Wide Alien Comet Captured Over Hawaii
item.description: The Gemini North Telescope is the latest observatory to capture images of the interstellar object 3I/ATLAS / C/2025 N1 (ATLAS), the third such object ...

item.title: The Perseid Meteor Shower Begins Thursday: When To See It At Its Best
item.description: On July 17, the Perseid meteor shower begins just as the last quarter moon rises, but its peak night in August will be marred by moonlight.

item.title: Waymo Vets Are Automating Construction Sites With Self-Driving Dirt Diggers

item.title: How To Reinvent Your Business For AI: A Roadmap To Transformation
item.description: For this blog, I want to focus on reinvention, because this is where the true competitive advantage lies.
